record.field:
"""^XA~TA000~JSN^LT0^MNW^MTD^PON^PMN^LH0,0^JMA^PR4,4~SD15^JUS^LRN^CI0^XZ ^XA ^MMT ^PW679 ^LL0531 ^LS0 ^FT23,65^A0N,22,36^FH\^FDHENNART FRERES S.A.S^FS ^FT425,190^A0N,33,33^FH\^FD{date}^FS ^FT23,245^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{prodlot_ref}^FS ^FT90,90^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{product_code}^FS ^FT23,90^A0N,21,19^FH\^FDcode: ^FS ^FT23,135^A0N,30,40^FH\^FD{product_name}^FS ^BY2,3,81^FT21,345^BCN,,Y,N ^FD>:{barcode}^FS ^FO15,100^GB610,60,2^FS ^FO524,34^GE97,60,2^FS ^FT536,70^A0N,13,16^FH\^FD62.215.030^FS ^FT555,52^A0N,13,31^FH\^FDFR^FS ^FT566,88^A0N,17,14^FH\^FDCE^FS ^FT23,215^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{prodlot_label}^FS ^FT23,180^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{date_label}^FS ^PQ1,0,1,Y^XZ""".format( product_code=object.product_id.default_code, product_name=object.product_id.name,
prodlot_label="Lot:", prodlot_ref=object.ref, barcode=f"{object.get_label_barcode()}",
date_label=object.date_label, date=f"{object.expiration_date:%d/%m/%Y}", )

"""^XA~TA000~JSN^LT0^MNW^MTD^PON^PMN^LH0,0^JMA^PR4,4~SD15^JUS^LRN^CI0^XZ ^XA ^MMT ^PW679 ^LL0531 ^LS0 ^FT23,65^A0N,22,36^FH\^FDHENNART FRERES S.A.S^FS ^FT425,245^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{weight}^FS ^FT425,215^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{weight_label}^FS ^FT425,190^A0N,33,33^FH\^FD{date}^FS ^FT23,245^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{prodlot_ref}^FS ^FT90,90^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{product_code}^FS ^FT23,90^A0N,21,19^FH\^FDcode: ^FS ^FT23,135^A0N,30,40^FH\^FD{product_name}^FS ^BY2,3,81^FT21,345^BCN,,Y,N ^FD>:{barcode}^FS ^FO15,100^GB610,60,2^FS ^FO524,34^GE97,60,2^FS ^FT536,70^A0N,13,16^FH\^FD62.215.030^FS ^FT555,52^A0N,13,31^FH\^FDFR^FS ^FT566,88^A0N,17,14^FH\^FDCE^FS ^FT23,215^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{prodlot_label}^FS ^FT23,180^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{date_label}^FS ^PQ1,0,1,Y^XZ""".format(
weight_label=f"{object.get_label_weight()}", weight=f"{object.get_weight()}", product_code=object.lot_id.product_id.default_code, product_name=object.lot_id.product_id.name,
prodlot_label="Lot:", prodlot_ref=object.lot_id.ref, barcode=f"{object.get_label_barcode()}",
date_label=object.lot_id.date_label, date=f"{object.lot_id.expiration_date:%d/%m/%Y}", )

"""^XA~TA000~JSN^LT0^MNW^MTD^PON^PMN^LH0,0^JMA^PR4,4~SD15^JUS^LRN^CI0^XZ ^XA ^MMT ^PW679 ^LL0531 ^LS0 ^FT23,65^A0N,22,36^FH\^FDHENNART FRERES S.A.S^FS ^FT425,245^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{weight}^FS ^FT425,215^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{weight_label}^FS ^FT425,190^A0N,33,33^FH\^FD{date}^FS ^FT23,245^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{prodlot_ref}^FS ^FT90,90^A0N,29,28^FH\^FD{product_code}^FS ^FT23,90^A0N,21,19^FH\^FDcode: ^FS ^FT23,135^A0N,30,40^FH\^FD{product_name}^FS ^BY2,3,81^FT21,345^BCN,,Y,N ^FD>:{barcode}^FS ^FO15,100^GB610,60,2^FS ^FO524,34^GE97,60,2^FS ^FT536,70^A0N,13,16^FH\^FD62.215.030^FS ^FT555,52^A0N,13,31^FH\^FDFR^FS ^FT566,88^A0N,17,14^FH\^FDCE^FS ^FT23,215^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{prodlot_label}^FS ^FT23,180^A0N,17,21^FH\^FD{date_label}^FS ^PQ1,0,1,Y^XZ""".format(
weight_label=object.weight_label, weight=object.weight_label_value, product_code=object.label_code, product_name=object.product_id.name,
prodlot_label="Lot:", prodlot_ref=object.lot_id.ref, barcode=object.lot_id.barcode,
date_label=object.lot_id.date_label, date=f"{object.lot_id.expiration_date:%d/%m/%Y}", )

"""^XA~TA000~JSN^LT0^MNW^MTD^PON^PMN^LH0,0^JMA^PR4,4~SD15^JUS^LRN^CI0^XZ ^XA ^MMT ^PW1004 ^LL0531 ^LS0
^FT23,65^A0N,45,35^FH\^FDSSCC:^FS ^FT23,115^A0N,20,20^FH\^FDHennart Freres SAS^FS
^BY2,3,70^FT120,90^BCN,,Y,N^FD{name}^FS
^FO15,120^GB640,182,2^FS ^FT23,145^A0N,20,20^FH\^FDAdresse de livraison:^FS ^FT203,145^A0N,25,25^FH\^FD{country}^FS ^FT370,145^A0N,20,20^FH\^FDDate de livraison:^FS ^FT530,145^A0N,25,25^FH\^FD{date}^FS
^FT23,185^A0N,35,35^FH\^FD{partner_name}^FS ^FT23,218^A0N,30,30^FH\^FD{street}^FS ^FT23,250^A0N,30,30^FH\^FD{street2}^FS ^FT23,285^A0N,30,30^FH\^FD{zip}^FS ^FT150,285^A0N,30,30^FH\^FD{city}^FS
^FO15,300^GB640,70,2^FS ^FT23,345^A0N,40,40^FH\^FD{carrier_name}^FS ^FT350,345^A0N,40,40^FH\^FD{carrier_zone}^FS ^FT500,350^A0N,60,60^FH\^FD{nb_sscc} / {nb_total_sscc}^FS
^PQ1,0,1,Y^XZ""".format( name=object.name, partner_name=object.picking_id.partner_id.parent_id and object.picking_id.partner_id.parent_id.name or object.picking_id.partner_id.name or '', carrier_zone=object.picking_id.partner_id.carrier_zone or object.picking_id.partner_id.parent_id.carrier_zone or '', street=object.picking_id.partner_id.street or '', street2=object.picking_id.partner_id.street2 or '', zip=object.picking_id.partner_id.zip or '', city=object.picking_id.partner_id.city or '', country=object.picking_id.partner_id.country_id.name or '', nb_sscc=object.nb_sscc, carrier_name=object.picking_id.carrier_id.name or '', nb_total_sscc=object.nb_total_sscc, date=object.picking_id.date_delivered and object.picking_id.date_delivered.strftime('%d/%m/%Y') or '', )
